review: I have two of them and they work great. Of course I wish it with more apps but it seems like they are always adding more apps.
author: Not Sure

review: It works ok... But you'll definitely want a high quality wireless router if you plan on using this thing. If you're not computer savvy I would not recommend this product. I had to do a lot of tweaking with my computer and router to get this thing all set up and working. But, once you get it going, it's great.
author: WGatlin

review: works wonderful and very easy to set up
